QuestData.Title: Gathering Light
QuestData.Description: Alleria and I long for more time with our son, but we cannot afford to wait any longer, $n. We must strike now.$b$bThe Army of the Light is scattered, but not defeated. Any survivors should have stayed near the crash site of the Xenedar. If there is any hope of victory, we must rally them and rescue Xe'ra.$b$bWith the pit lords dealt with, we should have a safer route to the Xenedar. Meet me in the krokul hovel as soon as you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Turalyon in the Krokul Hovel.
QuestData.RewardText: We've secured a foothold. Good.$b$bNow we take the fight to them!

Objectives.Objective: Use the Navigation Console to go to the Krokul Hovel
